item.title: Deploy virtual machines on Instant Servers cloud with Java
item.description: Instant Servers is the infrastructure as a service (IaaS) system I have been working on during the last months in Telefónica Digital. The service offers a public REST API (Cloud API) that is super simple to use. However, in this post I will show you how to manage your infrastructure using a Java client, without dealing with HTTP requests. Build the Cloud API client Man does not live by nodejs alone.
